a.title: Parent and Staff Child Abuse Prevention Training
a.span: Parent and Staff Child Abuse Prevention Training

li.a: Parent and Staff Child Abuse Prevention Training

p.style: box-sizing: border-box; font-variant-ligatures: none; margin-bottom: 0px; outline: none; position: relative; color: rgb(33, 33, 33); font-size: 15px; text-decoration-line: inherit; font-family: Lato, sans-serif; line-height: 1.6667; padding-top: 0px; letter-spacing: normal; white-space: pre-wrap;

div.p: We are launching Distance Learning for All in YC in line with the most recent guidance from the Oregon Department of Education. For the first two weeks we will focus on connecting with our families and providing some supplemental materials. Beginning on April 13th we will launch Distance Learning for All.

p.style: box-sizing: border-box; font-variant-ligatures: none; margin-top: 12px; margin-bottom: 0px; outline: none; position: relative; color: rgb(33, 33, 33); font-size: 15px; text-decoration-line: inherit; font-family: Lato, sans-serif; line-height: 1.6667; letter-spacing: normal; white-space: pre-wrap;

div.p: As more information about these details become available, we will share it with you in multiple ways including our website, Facebook, Twitter and our robo call system. Please make sure that your information is accurate on with your child's school(s). Email is the best form of communication at this time. YCES - fletcherk@ycschools.org YCIS - bertrandp@ycschools.org YCHS - vertnert@ycschools.org

p.style: box-sizing: border-box; font-variant-ligatures: none; margin-top: 12px; margin-bottom: 0px; outline: none; position: relative; color: rgb(33, 33, 33); font-size: 15px; text-decoration-line: inherit; font-family: Lato, sans-serif; line-height: 1.6667; letter-spacing: normal; white-space: pre-wrap;

div.p: Please recognize that this is an unprecedented time and guidance from the Oregon Department of Education is evolving. We will update our families as additional information becomes available.

span.strong: The school icons below will be routinely updated as things evolve.

hr.br:
Estamos lanzando el aprendizaje a distancia para todos en YC en lnea con la orientacin ms reciente del Departamento de Educacin de Oregn. Durante las primeras dos semanas nos enfocaremos en conectarnos con nuestras familias y proporcionar algunos materiales suplementarios. A partir del 13 de abril, lanzaremos el aprendizaje a distancia para todos.
A medida que haya ms informacin disponible sobre estos detalles, la compartiremos con usted de varias maneras, incluido nuestro sitio web, Facebook, Twitter y nuestro sistema de llamadas automticas. Asegrese de que su informacin sea precisa en la (s) escuela (s) de su hijo. El correo electrnico es la mejor forma de comunicacin en este momento.
YCES - fletcherk@ycschools.org YCIS - bertrandp@ycschools.org YCHS - vertnert@ycschools.org
Por favor reconozca que este es un momento sin precedentes y la orientacin del Departamento de Educacin de Oregn est evolucionando. Actualizaremos a nuestras familias a medida que haya informacin adicional disponible.
Los conos de la escuela a continuacin se actualizarn rutinariamente a medida que las cosas evolucionen.
Some icons are not clickable yet. They will be updated soon.

div.div: 120 N Larch Place, Yamhill, OR 97148 | Phone 503-852-6980 | Fax 503-662-4931
